review: Not that convinced.When trying to cast stuff -like pics or vids- from a motorola (ie a google) smartphone, most of the time it does not work.The chromecast key can read very limited kind of files (mp3 and some mp4).Moreover, you have to use paying app (or limited free apps), even for tasks as simple as streaming the files on your smartphone...And all the apps I tried where very heavy and not user-friendly.Hence, the title "streaming media player" is quite a lie and should be "streaming player, if you have mp3, jpg and mp4 files and you bought an *heavy* app on the playstore"On the other hand, it works like a charm with netflix, hence I am hesitating rating the key 2 or 3 stars.I did not try it with my computer, though.
author: Falou

review: I had to go to the internet for help on setting up the Google Chromecast. One small setting was the hold up. Has been working great since setup. I use it mostly with Netflix while using my smartphone. When I use my laptop I have to use Google Chrome explorer, so it is more like mirroring my laptop to my big screen.
author: Robert Shattuck "kabs"
